name: Ranger
description: You are an emissary of a deity, a devoted servant who has taken up a weighty mantle, and you devoutly pursue a cause that holds you apart from those around you.

name: Precision Ranger
description: You are an emissary of a deity, a devoted servant who has taken up a weighty mantle, and you devoutly pursue a cause that holds you apart from those around you.

name: Vindicator
description: Vindicators are skilled warriors who use keen analytical talents and a smattering of divine magic to seek out such monstrous prey and pronounce judgment upon them.

name: Ranger Archetype
description: You have studied hunting, tracking, and wilderness survival, adding a rangerâ€™s tools to your skill set. Your keen eyes while hunting prey help gather more information.
